introduction: A threshold opens somewhere inside. With the beats of a deep breath, two intimate spaces come to life and approach each other. Even before being perceived by a foreign animal, human or divine eye, there is deep within us, combined at all times, the inexorable self-perception with which our own creature advances, forever haloed. The nimbus, these lights which halo as much as they enact, open up the impossible shot against shot of this performative gaze.
